Parameters: the mime types to show in the picker. May not be null. If a zero-length array is provided, all non-folder files will be selectable
setMimeType(java.lang.String[]).Description: Sets the MIME type filter which controls which kinds of files can be selected from the file picker. If this method is not called or if a zero-length array is provided, all non-folder files will be selectable.

setActivityStartFolder(com.google.androi.Description: Sets the folder that the Activity will display initially. If not specified, it will default to the root of "My Drive".

Parameters: The @B_com#google#android#gms#common#api#GoogleApiClient_E@ to service the call. The client must be connected before invoking this method.
build(com.google.android.gms.common.api..Description: Builds an @B_android#content#IntentSender_E@ from the builder attributes that can be used to start the Open File activity using @B_android#app#Activity#startIntentSenderForResult_E@.

Parameters: the title to set on the activity (may not be null)
setActivityTitle(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the title displayed in the activity.

ClassDesc: A builder that is used to configure and display the open file activity. This activity displays files and folders from the user's Drive. The activity can be used to display all files in the Drive, not just those your application has access to. Your application will be given access to the selected file. To display the activity, pass the result of @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#OpenFileActivityBuilder#build_E@ to #startIntentSenderForResult(). When the activity completes, a successful response will include an extra @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#OpenFileActivityBuilder#EXTRA_RESPONSE_DRIVE_ID_E@ with the selected @B_com#google#android#gms#drive#DriveId_E@. Note: you cannot use #startActivity to invoke the activity. This will fail.
